snippet: The American McKayla Maroney, the overwhelming favorite to win a gold medal, fell in her second of two turns.
abstract: Sandra Izbasa of Romania earns the gold medal in the women's individual vault over McKayla Maroney of the United States; Maroney, the reigning world champion on vault, was supposed to win the event by a landslide but ended up with the silver medal after landing on her rear on her second vault; other gymnastic results noted.
lead_paragraph: The American McKayla Maroney, the overwhelming favorite to win a gold medal, fell in her second of two turns.

headline.seo: McKayla Maroney Settles for Olympic Silver in Vault
headline.main: American Slips at the Finish, Losing Her Grip on the Gold
headline.print_headline: American Slips at the Finish, Losing Her Grip on the Gold
